^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

HSLLInterface.description: This is a link to the HSLLInterface provided by this port
HSLLInterface.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a resource that complies to the HSLLInterface schema.

PCIeFunctions.description: This is a link to a collection of PCIeFunctions exposed by this port
PCIeFunctions.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the PCIeFunction schema.

Provider.description: The provider of this Port. This can either be a Switch or a ComposedNode.
Provider.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference that complies to the Switch or ComposedNode schema.

VLANs.description: This is a reference to a collection of VLANs.
VLANs.longDescription: The value of this property shall reference a collection of VLAN resources.

title: #EID_47597_RECSBox_Port.v1_0_0
